unnormalised: Flash sales, huh? My wallet trembles like a Delhi winter! It's like Onam Sadhya – so much offered, you just grab blindly. Will I *really* use that 500 Rs gadget? Probably not. Did I NEED another embroidered dupatta? Absolutely not. But, FOMO is real, yaar! Retailers are playing chess, while I'm here just trying to avoid getting checkmated in this Diwali season of deals! Sigh.
normalised: Flash sales, huh? My wallet trembles like a Delhi winter! It's like Onam Sadhya – so much offered, you just grab blindly. Will I *really* use that five hundred rupee gadget? Probably not. Did I NEED another embroidered dupatta? Absolutely not. But, F O M O is real, yaar! Retailers are playing chess, while I'm here just trying to avoid getting checkmated in this Diwali season of deals! Sigh.
